xml.question: Where will the Mahasamadhi Camp be held this summer?
xml.explanation: The Mahasamadhi Camp commemorates Swami Chinmayananda's attainment of Mahasamadhi, and brings together members of the Chinmaya Mission community from around the world to further their study of Vedanta. The 23rd annual Mahasamadhi Camp will be held in Dallas, Texas in July, 2016.
